attributes.action: Refuse the planning application for Land fill waste management site in Shepshed Leicestershire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a planning application from Biffa Waste Services Limited - No 2007/C029/02,lodged with leicestershire county council, which intends to convert Charnwood quarries at Shepshed into a land fill waste management site.
The site outlined is in close proximity to the small community, and there are concerns over the envirmental impact of such a development, it is felt that the site would benefit from a more ecologically/enviromantally friendly application such as nature reserve/site of natural beauty etc.
We ask the Prime Minister to block the the application above and instigate the pursuance of an alternative a application of the site which is more in keeping with the area,community and surroundings.
